text: Designing and Implementing AZURE cloud infrastructure with SSPR, CAP and MFA

Orchestrated comprehensive oversight of 120K Active Directory user accounts for diverse profiles comprised of students and educators; optimized account settings to enhance security measures without impacting usability.

Executed strategic oversight of O365 mailboxes, ensuring optimal performance and accessibility for over 120K active users; achieved seamless integration within existing systems by addressing common account-related issues directly impacting student engagement.
Guide Level 2 support team on BAU activities and provide leadership for mentoring.
Implementing automation for routine tasks via logic apps and PowerShell which cut down operational hours spent by 30%.
Managing SPF, DMARC and DKIM authentication using Vali mail for external mail domains.
Influence Cyber security posture of the company by incorporating CIS standards to reduce the vulnerability score in Qulays.
Acting as an automation expert in the Hyper-Automation COE, aiding to centralize all automation efforts throughout the company.
Spearheading the INSEAD AD Migration project to move 125K accounts, 20K security groups and 1000+ computer objects to a new domain with a scalable OU design.
Renewed the INSEAD Wildcard certificate for SSO affecting 220 Application environments without any P1 incidents during a 1-hour window.
Migrated 120k user accounts from DUO MFA to Azure MFA including Windows and Linux MFA for servers.
Transformed 50+ PowerShell scripts to Ansible templates, enhancing version control, security, and access control for the service desk.

Spearheaded the transition towards low-code/no-code workflow solutions for cross-departmental teams, achieving time savings of approximately 15 hours per week for project completion through structured collaboration efforts.

Orchestrated the design and execution of comprehensive automation solutions, including patching and intelligent document processing; directly resulting in a 40% decrease in manual task completion time across operations.

Championed collaborative sessions with Technical Leads and Business Unit Heads to pinpoint specific process inefficiencies, delivering comprehensive findings that rectify three significant bottlenecks affecting overall productivity.
Advanced automation capabilities within MOQdigital.

Resolved intricate problems related to newly implemented automations as an integral part of the team's success; identified key areas needing improvement based on findings from direct interaction with end users daily.

Executed robust ITIL frameworks encompassing Change and Incident Management processes; crafted a systematic approach leading to an impressive 30% boost in issue resolution speed across all teams within the automation division.

Established robust communication channels between Business Unit Heads when identifying areas ripe for process improvement initiatives; fostered teamwork efforts that resulted in developing five successful projects impacting revenue streams positively.

Pioneered innovative strategies leading to effective resource allocation during the creation of an internal Automation team; established standardized workflows which resulted in saving 150+ hours monthly spent on manual tasks through automation technologies.
Implemented an Azure Patch Automation solution using Azure Update Management, PowerShell, and Power BI to streamline patching processes and reduce operational overhead by 60%.
Transitioned from MS Excel to Power BI for data visualization, creating KPI and Automation Team Dashboards that simplified reporting processes, resulting in a 75% reduction in report generation time.
Sustained and supported over 800+ host VMware environments by offering guidance and supervision to engineers and other peers in the department.
Coordinate with VMware BCS technical division to mitigate tier 3 Priority one incidents.
Serving as a VMWare Administrator providing mid-senior level Tier 3 virtualization system administration support services.

Administered comprehensive assessments on existing virtualization services leading to significant enhancements; findings directly enhanced reliability issues contributing to an overall boost in system uptime by more than 30%.

Implemented targeted security hardening measures based on evaluations supervised in a controlled DT&E setup with over six configurations tested monthly ensuring resilience against emerging threats without sacrificing usability or performance levels.

Deployed VMware vSphere tools for seamless installation processes while mastering PowerCLI commands; boosted upgrade turnaround times from weeks to a mere three days through efficient scripting techniques.

Enhanced existing VMware documentation processes by systematically updating operation manuals to align with industry standards; reduced manual errors during audits by over 30%, improving overall system reliability.
Perfected an automated VMware ESXi patching solution, "Host' O Mator," using PowerCLI, reducing operational overhead by saving over 4,800 man-hours annually.
3rd place in Hackathon conducted by Pearson Tech Summit.
Managed and maintained VMware vCenter 5.x/6.x environments with over 2,000 VMs across 100+ blade servers in 20+ clusters.

Deployed and configured 50+ ESXi servers with high availability (HA) and distributed resource scheduling (DRS), optimizing vCenter setups on enterprise-grade hardware, enhancing system uptime by approximately 99.9%.

Transformed existing procedural inefficiencies into streamlined automation using advanced coding techniques within PowerShell environment; directly contributed to meeting rigorous compliance deadlines with zero audit findings over six consecutive months.
Performed VM deployments, storage and host migrations, and network configurations for vMotion and VLANs.

Resolved a range of critical incidents related to VMware infrastructure components including vCenter and VMs; findings identified root causes leading to major enhancements in overall system stability within six months.
Monitored systems using SCOM and Nagios while managing incidents, service requests, and changes.
Rising Star of the year 2016 at 99X Service's Annual Award Ceremony 2016.
Employee of the 4th Quarter at 99X Service's Annual Award Ceremony 2017.

Pioneered the design and deployment of a Windows-based Patch Automation Solution using SCCM and MS Orchestrator, resulting in an impressive 75% reduction in manual patching efforts across all systems.
Catering L1 and L2 support for customer network issues, ensuring timely resolution of faults and excellent customer service.

Directed datacenter operations with a focus on rectifying routing issues, guiding new connections for clients, and conducting detailed fault analysis to enhance service reliability across 100+ customer accounts.
Configured and troubleshot internet, VPN, Linux-based 3G routers, and Wi-Fi networks for vendors such as Mikrotik, Ubiquiti, Unifi, and Cisco.
Delivered customer first solutions by diagnosing and resolving technical issues with a focus on efficiency and reliability.

Innovated a responsive web application showcasing live changes in the OSPF network topology using Observium; delivered immediate insights that improved troubleshooting times by 30% during peak operational hours.
Designed and developed web applications, including content creation, client-side/server-side scripting, and e-commerce functionality.

Conducted thorough analysis of existing systems and identified key areas for improvement; drafted comprehensive specifications leading to a 25% increase in operational efficiency within the first quarter post-implementation.
Conducted product testing in controlled environments and prepared user training manuals for seamless deployment.

Crafted an innovative app utilizing Gmail and JIRA APIs in PHP; enabled tracking of applicant progress while automating reporting functions, ultimately reducing manual entry time by 60 hours per month across the recruitment team.
